jobDescription: Under general supervision (but works independently most of the time) the team is responsible for the delivery of global market data services. Northern Trust leverages the use of financial market data to support many of our products and processes globally. NT?s business units rely on a variety of pricing, data, information and tools to support clients, investment decisions, custody, outsourcing (IOO) and fund operations on a daily basis to name a few. The team works across all classes of financial instruments including equities, fixed income, currency, derivatives, research and news.Northern Trust has centralized the global management of market data, brokerage, clearing and sub custody within the Enterprise Market Data team. This team is responsible for managing enterprise use of these services including but not limited to sourcing, global vendor management, entitlements of services, inventory of users, cost allocation, invoice validation and processing, supplier reporting and supplier audits amongst other responsibilities. The team is also very engaged with our Clients in services such as RFP responses, Industry SME sessions, presentations, onboarding and redistribution validation to name a few. 1.
